extends java.lang.Object

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private MyResponse findInResponsesMap(java.lang.Long key)
      This method is used to search response gateway for transaction result, It can be replaced by memory caches to achieve better performance
      ApiResponse getLogs(LogRequest logRequest, java.lang.String accountNo)
      service method that fetches transaction logs from data base ( both financial and non-financial logs)
      ApiResponse getResponseForTID(long tid)
      Service method used for retrieving transaction result It first looks at response gateway cache and if there is no response there, then it will connect to the db and read logs for that transaction id

      • put

        public void put(MyResponse message)
        Method which are used by response gateway to share messages with rest part

      • findInResponsesMap

        private MyResponse findInResponsesMap(java.lang.Long key)
        This method is used to search response gateway for transaction result, It can be replaced by memory caches to achieve better performance

      • getResponseForTID

        public ApiResponse getResponseForTID(long tid)
        Service method used for retrieving transaction result It first looks at response gateway cache and if there is no response there, then it will connect to the db and read logs for that transaction id
        Parameters:
        tid - - transaction id
        Returns:
        - ApiResponse (transaction result details)

      • getLogs

        public ApiResponse getLogs(LogRequest logRequest,
                           java.lang.String accountNo)
        service method that fetches transaction logs from data base ( both financial and non-financial logs)
        Parameters:
        logRequest - - log request(start, end, tid, ....)
        Returns:
        - ApiResponse (log result result details)

      • serachLogs

        private java.util.List<LogEntity> serachLogs(boolean desc,
                                             java.lang.Long start,
                                             java.lang.Long end,
                                             java.lang.Long tid,
                                             java.lang.String accountNo)
        private method that fetches transaction logs from data base ( both financial and non-financial logs)
        Parameters:
        desc - - order of logs
        start - - timestamp of query start time
        end - - timestamp of query end time
        tid - - transaction id
        accountNo - - Account number
        Returns:
        - ApiResponse (log result result details)
